articles.title: CO2 removal ‘gap’ shows countries ‘lack progress’ for 1.5C warming limit - Carbon Brief
articles.description: carbon dioxide removal “fall short” of the quantities needed to limit global warming to 1.5C above pre-industrial levels, new research warns.
articles.content:
Plans to draw down CO2 from the atmosphere known as carbon dioxide removal (CDR) fall short of the quantities needed to limit global warming to 1.5C above pre-industrial levels, new research warns.
